amendment.description: Amendment sought to zero out all land acquistion programs within the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies bill and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to zero out land acquisition accounts of BLM, FWS, NPS, and FS.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.
